english.segment1: Thoughts of You and how You changed me. Fill my mind. Without You where would I be
english.segment2: So even though I've tried to express my thanks. It never comes out how I hoped. I want to say so much more so with these simple words. I'll try
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. I love You. My heart is Yours, only Yours. I long to give You all of me. My everything, my everything
english.segment4: God I never could repay You. You gave everything. Without You where would I be
english.segment5: You still loved me even when I. Pushed You away. You stood there and waited. Till the day I'd return
